name: Potatoes Adventure !
description:
You are a potatoes, your life is simple, but one day you have been eaten !

Your objective ?

Don't be digest !

Clear 3 stages of digestion without die !

Control :

First level : 

SPAM ZQSD or WASD (set in main menu for you) for movement, avoid theeth and if you survive 30 seconds go down !

Second level :

You can move right or left with Q - D (or A - D), if you touch the throat you move up, in the level get the salad (the cursor on the HUD show you where is it), if you canno't reach it ... You will see 😏

Third level :

First you need too avoid the bubble and go all the way down in the stomack, when you arrive, you need to go up and follow the cursor on the HUD.

Phase 1 : Q - D or A - D (move left or right)

Phase 2 : Q - D or A - D and Space for jump (move left or right)

Phase 3 : Q - D or A - D (move left or right)

Note : Sorry for the control and the hitbox for level 3 i didn't have enought time for polish it 😭

Good luck and Have fun !

Note 2 : You can now play the game in your favorite (or compatible ;)) browser !
